Test Name: PEACH (Pepsinogen I and II), Immunoglobulin E (IGE), Serum Biochemistry
Purpose: To measure Pepsinogen I and II for gastric function assessment, Immunoglobulin E levels for allergic response evaluation, and various biochemical analytes in serum for patient diagnosis and monitoring.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube
Equipment: Centrifuge, automated analyzer, calibrated pipettes, refrigerated storage units
